66class can_frame : public ::can_frame
67{
69 using base = ::can_frame;
70
72 static constexpr size_t SZ = sizeof(::can_frame);
73
74public:
79 can_frame() : base{} {}
85 can_frame(canid_t canID, const string& data)
86 : can_frame{canID, data.data(), data.length()} {}
93 can_frame(canid_t canID, const void* data, size_t n) : base{} {
94 this->can_id = canID;
95 this->can_dlc = n;
96 ::memcpy(&this->data, data, n);
97 }
102 can_frame(const base& frame) : base{frame} {}
